name: soundcardinstrment
short_description:
sound card instrument means:

this is an instrument build with mfc and pc
hardware firstly utilize: sound card for  A/D and D/A
run on pc(windows os)
develop by visual c++ 6 / mfc 
firstly can be regarded as a " digital oscilloscope ", save and display waveform from sound card 
i dont know much software engineering, just do a simple software, as simple and simple and simple as possible, this is human software not pretend to be a software(they are always complicated)  
can be used when you want to debug circuits if there is any signal change frequency below 20KHz , or transient time larger then 50us - 50 micro second

lets enjoy.
